pages.text: Treeing Walker Coonhounds were originally bred for hunting raccoons and other small game animals.$(br2)Standing at roughly a block tall, these sharp-nosed dogs come in two different coats.
Example of a Treeing Walker Coonhound
These dogs are most commonly found in forests, dark forests, and old growth birch forests. They can also be found in various taigas.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
